com.ulflander.minethat.model
Class Sentence

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.minethat.model.Text
      com.ulflander.minethat.model.Sentence

public class Sentence
extends Text

Model of sentence. A sentence is contained into paragraphs, and contains some tokens.

Since:
2/24/14
Author:
Ulflander
